data.name: Baklava Simulator
data.detailed_description:
ABOUT THIS GAME
You can buy the market. You can fill and empty the market as you wish.
He can talk to your staff. You can call a mechanic for broken materials.
When you run out of money, you can go to the bank and get a loan.
You can buy new tools. You can customize them as you wish.
You can buy new generation houses. You can customize the interior as you wish.
If you want to protect your vehicles and don't want anything to happen to you. You can buy a garage.
In your spare time, you can go to the disco and have fun and dance as you wish.
In order not to die of hunger, you can order food or buy it from the market.
In order not to die of thirst, you can order food or buy it from the market.
You may need sleep to avoid fainting from lack of sleep.
You can increase the popularity of your market.
You can add fun to your market by calling a clown.
You can work more motivated by giving more salary to your staff.
You can have a better one by upgrading the spoiled materials.

data.short_description: Build your own market. You can buy the materials to make the baklava and have it done by your staff. In addition, many functions of the content is located.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
